trans-unit.source: Learn to use Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Learn to use Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to install and use Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight to connect to a Hadoop cluster and run a Hive query.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to install and use Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight to connect to a Hadoop cluster and run a Hive query.

trans-unit.source: Get started using Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight to run a Hive query
trans-unit.target: Get started using Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight to run a Hive query

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio to connect to HDInsight clusters and submit Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio to connect to HDInsight clusters and submit Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using HDInsight, see [Introduction to HDInsight][hdinsight.introduction] and [Get started with HDInsight][hdinsight.get.started].
trans-unit.target: For more information about using HDInsight, see [Introduction to HDInsight][hdinsight.introduction] and [Get started with HDInsight][hdinsight.get.started].

trans-unit.source: For more information about connecting to a Storm cluster, see [Develop C# topologies for Apache Storm on HDInsight using Visual Studio][hdinsight.storm.visual.studio.tools].
trans-unit.target: For more information about connecting to a Storm cluster, see [Develop C# topologies for Apache Storm on HDInsight using Visual Studio][hdinsight.storm.visual.studio.tools].

trans-unit.source: **Prerequisites**
trans-unit.target: **Prerequisites**

trans-unit.source: To complete this tutorial and use the Hadoop tools in Visual Studio, you'll need the following:
trans-unit.target: To complete this tutorial and use the Hadoop tools in Visual Studio, you'll need the following:

trans-unit.source: An Azure HDInsight cluster: Either a Linux-based or Windows-based cluster will work with the steps in this document.
trans-unit.target: An Azure HDInsight cluster: Either a Linux-based or Windows-based cluster will work with the steps in this document.

trans-unit.source: See one of the following for information on creating a cluster:
trans-unit.target: See one of the following for information on creating a cluster:

trans-unit.source: [Get started using Linux-based HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started.md)
trans-unit.target: [Get started using Linux-based HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started.md)

trans-unit.source: [Get started using Windows-based HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md)
trans-unit.target: [Get started using Windows-based HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md)

trans-unit.source: A workstation with the following software:
trans-unit.target: A workstation with the following software:

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1, Windows 8, or Windows 7
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1, Windows 8, or Windows 7

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio (one of the following versions):
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio (one of the following versions):

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2013 Community/Professional/Premium/Ultimate with [Update 4](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=44921)
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2013 Community/Professional/Premium/Ultimate with [Update 4](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=44921)

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 (Community/Enterprise)
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 (Community/Enterprise)

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Currently, the HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio only come with the English version.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Currently, the HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio only come with the English version.

trans-unit.source: Install HDInsight tools for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Install HDInsight tools for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio and Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver are packaged with Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET version 2.5.1 or later.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio and Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver are packaged with Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET version 2.5.1 or later.

trans-unit.source: You can install it using the [Web Platform Installer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255386).
trans-unit.target: You can install it using the [Web Platform Installer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255386).

trans-unit.source: You must choose the one that matches your version of Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: You must choose the one that matches your version of Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have Visual Studio installed, you can install the latest Visual Studio Community and Azure SDK using the [Web Platform Installer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255386) or using the following links:
trans-unit.target: If you don't have Visual Studio installed, you can install the latest Visual Studio Community and Azure SDK using the [Web Platform Installer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=255386) or using the following links:

trans-unit.source: [Visual Studio Community 2015 with Microsoft Azure SDK](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VS2015CommunityAzurePack.appids)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Studio Community 2015 with Microsoft Azure SDK](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VS2015CommunityAzurePack.appids)

trans-unit.source: [Visual Studio Community 2013 with Microsoft Azure SDK](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VS2013CommunityAzurePack.appids)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Studio Community 2013 with Microsoft Azure SDK](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VS2013CommunityAzurePack.appids)

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET (VS 2015)](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VWDOrVs2015AzurePack.appids)
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET (VS 2015)](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VWDOrVs2015AzurePack.appids)

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET (VS 2013)](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VWDOrVs2013AzurePack.appids)
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET (VS 2013)](https://www.microsoft.com/web/handlers/webpi.ashx/getinstaller/VWDOrVs2013AzurePack.appids)

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: HDinsight Tools for Visual Studio Web Platform installer.][1]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: HDinsight Tools for Visual Studio Web Platform installer.][1]

trans-unit.source: Connect to Azure subscriptions
trans-unit.target: Connect to Azure subscriptions

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio allows you to connect to your HDInsight clusters, perform some basic management operations, and run Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio allows you to connect to your HDInsight clusters, perform some basic management operations, and run Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] For information on connecting to a generic Hadoop cluster, see [Write and submit Hive queries using Visual Studio](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/xiaoyong/archive/2015/05/04/how-to-write-and-submit-hive-queries-using-visual-studio.aspx).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] For information on connecting to a generic Hadoop cluster, see [Write and submit Hive queries using Visual Studio](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/xiaoyong/archive/2015/05/04/how-to-write-and-submit-hive-queries-using-visual-studio.aspx).

trans-unit.source: **To connect to your Azure subscription**
trans-unit.target: **To connect to your Azure subscription**

trans-unit.source: Open Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Open Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: From the **View** menu, click **Server Explorer** to open the Server Explorer window.
trans-unit.target: From the **View** menu, click **Server Explorer** to open the Server Explorer window.

trans-unit.source: Expand **Azure**, and then expand **HDInsight**.
trans-unit.target: Expand **Azure**, and then expand **HDInsight**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]Notice the **HDInsight Task List** window should be open.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]Notice the **HDInsight Task List** window should be open.

trans-unit.source: If you don't see it, click **Other Windows** from the **View** menu, and then click **HDInsight Task List Window**.
trans-unit.target: If you don't see it, click **Other Windows** from the **View** menu, and then click **HDInsight Task List Window**.

trans-unit.source: Enter your Azure subscription credentials, and then click **Sign In**.
trans-unit.target: Enter your Azure subscription credentials, and then click **Sign In**.

trans-unit.source: This is only required if you have never connected to the Azure subscription from Visual Studio on this workstation.
trans-unit.target: This is only required if you have never connected to the Azure subscription from Visual Studio on this workstation.

trans-unit.source: In Server Explorer, you'll see a list of existing HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: In Server Explorer, you'll see a list of existing HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have any clusters, you can provision one by using the Azure Portal, Azure PowerShell, or the HDInsight SDK.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have any clusters, you can provision one by using the Azure Portal, Azure PowerShell, or the HDInsight SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Provision HDInsight clusters][hdinsight-provision].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Provision HDInsight clusters][hdinsight-provision].

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio Server Explorer cluster list][5]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio Server Explorer cluster list][5]

trans-unit.source: Expand an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Expand an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: You'll see **Hive Databases**, a default storage account, linked storage accounts, and **Hadoop Service log**.
trans-unit.target: You'll see **Hive Databases**, a default storage account, linked storage accounts, and **Hadoop Service log**.

trans-unit.source: You can further expand the entities.
trans-unit.target: You can further expand the entities.

trans-unit.source: After you've connected to your Azure subscription, you'll be able to do the following:
trans-unit.target: After you've connected to your Azure subscription, you'll be able to do the following:

trans-unit.source: **To connect to the Azure portal from Visual Studio**
trans-unit.target: **To connect to the Azure portal from Visual Studio**

trans-unit.source: From Server Explorer, expand **Azure** > **HDInsight**, right-click an HDInsight cluster, and then click **Manage Cluster in Azure Portal**.
trans-unit.target: From Server Explorer, expand **Azure** > **HDInsight**, right-click an HDInsight cluster, and then click **Manage Cluster in Azure Portal**.

trans-unit.source: **To ask questions and provide feedback from Visual Studio**
trans-unit.target: **To ask questions and provide feedback from Visual Studio**

trans-unit.source: From the **Tools** menu, click **HDInsight**, and then click **MSDN Forum** to ask questions, or click **Give Feedback**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Tools** menu, click **HDInsight**, and then click **MSDN Forum** to ask questions, or click **Give Feedback**.

trans-unit.source: Navigate the linked resources
trans-unit.target: Navigate the linked resources

trans-unit.source: From Server Explorer, you can see the default storage account and any linked storage accounts.
trans-unit.target: From Server Explorer, you can see the default storage account and any linked storage accounts.

trans-unit.source: If you expand the default storage account, you can see the containers on the storage account.
trans-unit.target: If you expand the default storage account, you can see the containers on the storage account.

trans-unit.source: The default storage account and the default container are marked.
trans-unit.target: The default storage account and the default container are marked.

trans-unit.source: You can also right-click any of the containers to view the contents.
trans-unit.target: You can also right-click any of the containers to view the contents.

trans-unit.source: ![HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio server explorer cluster list][2]
trans-unit.target: ![HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio server explorer cluster list][2]

trans-unit.source: Run a Hive query
trans-unit.target: Run a Hive query

trans-unit.source: [Apache Hive][apache.hive] is a data warehouse infrastructure built on Hadoop for providing data summarization, queries, and analysis.
trans-unit.target: [Apache Hive][apache.hive] is a data warehouse infrastructure built on Hadoop for providing data summarization, queries, and analysis.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio supports running Hive queries from Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio supports running Hive queries from Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Hive, see [Use Hive with HDInsight][hdinsight.hive].
trans-unit.target: For more information about Hive, see [Use Hive with HDInsight][hdinsight.hive].

trans-unit.source: It is time consuming to test Hive script against an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: It is time consuming to test Hive script against an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: It could take several minutes or more.
trans-unit.target: It could take several minutes or more.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio is capable of validating Hive script locally without connecting to a live cluster.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio is capable of validating Hive script locally without connecting to a live cluster.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio also enables users to see what’s inside the Hive job by collecting and surfacing the YARN logs of certain Hive jobs.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio also enables users to see what’s inside the Hive job by collecting and surfacing the YARN logs of certain Hive jobs.

trans-unit.source: View the **hivesampletable**
trans-unit.target: View the **hivesampletable**

trans-unit.source: All HDInsight clusters come with a sample Hive table called *hivesampletable*.
trans-unit.target: All HDInsight clusters come with a sample Hive table called *hivesampletable*.

trans-unit.source: We'll use this table to show you how to list Hive tables, view the table schemas, and list the rows in the Hive table.
trans-unit.target: We'll use this table to show you how to list Hive tables, view the table schemas, and list the rows in the Hive table.

trans-unit.source: **To list Hive tables and view Hive table schema**
trans-unit.target: **To list Hive tables and view Hive table schema**

trans-unit.source: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure** > **HDInsight** > the cluster of your choice > **Hive Databases** > **Default** > **hivesampletable** to see the table schema.
trans-unit.target: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure** > **HDInsight** > the cluster of your choice > **Hive Databases** > **Default** > **hivesampletable** to see the table schema.

trans-unit.source: Right-click **hivesampletable**, and then click **View Top 100 Rows** to list the rows.
trans-unit.target: Right-click **hivesampletable**, and then click **View Top 100 Rows** to list the rows.

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to running the following Hive query using Hive ODBC driver:
trans-unit.target: It is equivalent to running the following Hive query using Hive ODBC driver:

trans-unit.source: You can customize the row count.
trans-unit.target: You can customize the row count.

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: HDinsight Hive Visual Studio schema query][6]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: HDinsight Hive Visual Studio schema query][6]

trans-unit.source: Create Hive tables
trans-unit.target: Create Hive tables

trans-unit.source: You can use the GUI to create a Hive table or use Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: You can use the GUI to create a Hive table or use Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: For information about using Hive queries, see [Run Hive queries](#run.queries).
trans-unit.target: For information about using Hive queries, see [Run Hive queries](#run.queries).

trans-unit.source: **To create a Hive table**
trans-unit.target: **To create a Hive table**

trans-unit.source: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure** > **HDInsight Clusters** an HDInsight cluster > **Hive Databases**, then right-click **default**, and click **Create Table**.
trans-unit.target: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure** > **HDInsight Clusters** an HDInsight cluster > **Hive Databases**, then right-click **default**, and click **Create Table**.

trans-unit.source: Configure the table.
trans-unit.target: Configure the table.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create Table** to submit the job to create the new Hive table.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create Table** to submit the job to create the new Hive table.

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: hdinsight visual studio tools create hive table][7]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: hdinsight visual studio tools create hive table][7]

trans-unit.source: Validate and run Hive queries
trans-unit.target: Validate and run Hive queries

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to create and run Hive queries:
trans-unit.target: There are two ways to create and run Hive queries:

trans-unit.source: Create ad-hoc queries
trans-unit.target: Create ad-hoc queries

trans-unit.source: Create a Hive application
trans-unit.target: Create a Hive application

trans-unit.source: **To create, validate, and run ad-hoc queries**
trans-unit.target: **To create, validate, and run ad-hoc queries**

trans-unit.source: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure**, and then expand **HDInsight Clusters**.
trans-unit.target: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure**, and then expand **HDInsight Clusters**.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the cluster where you want to run the query, and then click **Write a Hive Query**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the cluster where you want to run the query, and then click **Write a Hive Query**.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: Notice the Hive editor supports IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Notice the Hive editor supports IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio supports loading the remote metadata when you are editing your Hive script.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio supports loading the remote metadata when you are editing your Hive script.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you type "SELECT * FROM", the IntelliSense lists all the suggested table names.
trans-unit.target: For example, when you type "SELECT * FROM", the IntelliSense lists all the suggested table names.

trans-unit.source: When a table name is specified, the column names are listed by the IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: When a table name is specified, the column names are listed by the IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: The tool supports almost all Hive DML statements, subqueries, and the built-in UDFs.
trans-unit.target: The tool supports almost all Hive DML statements, subqueries, and the built-in UDFs.

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Visual Studio Tools IntelliSense][13]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Visual Studio Tools IntelliSense][13]

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Visual Studio Tools IntelliSense][14]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Visual Studio Tools IntelliSense][14]

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Only the metadata of the clusters that is selected in HDInsight Toolbar will be suggested.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Only the metadata of the clusters that is selected in HDInsight Toolbar will be suggested.

trans-unit.source: (Optional): Click **Validate Script** to check the script syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: (Optional): Click **Validate Script** to check the script syntax errors.

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: hdinsight tools for Visual Studio local validation][10]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: hdinsight tools for Visual Studio local validation][10]

trans-unit.source: Click **Submit** or **Submit (Advanced)**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Submit** or **Submit (Advanced)**.

trans-unit.source: With the advanced submit option, you'll configure **Job Name**, **Arguments**, **Additional Configurations**, and **Status Directory** for the script:
trans-unit.target: With the advanced submit option, you'll configure **Job Name**, **Arguments**, **Additional Configurations**, and **Status Directory** for the script:

trans-unit.source: ![hdinsight hadoop hive query][9]
trans-unit.target: ![hdinsight hadoop hive query][9]

trans-unit.source: After you submit the job, you see a **Hive Job Summary** window.
trans-unit.target: After you submit the job, you see a **Hive Job Summary** window.

trans-unit.source: ![Summary of an HDInsight Hadoop Hive query][8]
trans-unit.target: ![Summary of an HDInsight Hadoop Hive query][8]

trans-unit.source: Use the **Refresh** button to update the status until the job status changes to **Completed**.
trans-unit.target: Use the **Refresh** button to update the status until the job status changes to **Completed**.

trans-unit.source: Click the links at the bottom to see the following: **Job Query**, **Job Output**, **Job log**, or **Yarn log**.
trans-unit.target: Click the links at the bottom to see the following: **Job Query**, **Job Output**, **Job log**, or **Yarn log**.

trans-unit.source: **To create and run a Hive solution**
trans-unit.target: **To create and run a Hive solution**

trans-unit.source: From the **FILE** menu, click **New**, and then click **Project**.
trans-unit.target: From the **FILE** menu, click **New**, and then click **Project**.

trans-unit.source: Select **HDInsight** from the left pane, select **Hive Application** in the middle pane, enter the properties, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Select **HDInsight** from the left pane, select **Hive Application** in the middle pane, enter the properties, and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: hdinsight visual studio tools new hive project][11]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: hdinsight visual studio tools new hive project][11]

trans-unit.source: From **Solution Explorer**, double-click **Script.hql** to open it.
trans-unit.target: From **Solution Explorer**, double-click **Script.hql** to open it.

trans-unit.source: To validate the Hive script, you can click the **Validate Script** button, or right-click the script in the Hive editor, and then click **Validate Script** from the context menu.
trans-unit.target: To validate the Hive script, you can click the **Validate Script** button, or right-click the script in the Hive editor, and then click **Validate Script** from the context menu.

trans-unit.source: View Hive jobs
trans-unit.target: View Hive jobs

trans-unit.source: You can view job queries, job output, job logs, and Yarn logs for Hive jobs.
trans-unit.target: You can view job queries, job output, job logs, and Yarn logs for Hive jobs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the previous screenshot.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see the previous screenshot.

trans-unit.source: The most recent release of the tool allows you to see what’s inside your Hive jobs by collecting and surfacing YARN logs.
trans-unit.target: The most recent release of the tool allows you to see what’s inside your Hive jobs by collecting and surfacing YARN logs.

trans-unit.source: A YARN log can help you investigating performance issues.
trans-unit.target: A YARN log can help you investigating performance issues.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how HDInsight collects YARN logs, see [Access HDInsight Application Logs Programmatically][hdinsight.access.application.logs].
trans-unit.target: For more information about how HDInsight collects YARN logs, see [Access HDInsight Application Logs Programmatically][hdinsight.access.application.logs].

trans-unit.source: **To view Hive jobs**
trans-unit.target: **To view Hive jobs**

trans-unit.source: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure**, and then expand **HDInsight**.
trans-unit.target: From **Server Explorer**, expand **Azure**, and then expand **HDInsight**.

trans-unit.source: Right-click an HDInsight cluster, and then click **View Jobs**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click an HDInsight cluster, and then click **View Jobs**.

trans-unit.source: You'll see a list of the Hive jobs that ran on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: You'll see a list of the Hive jobs that ran on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Click a job in the job list to select it, and then use the **Hive Job Summary** window to open **Job Query**, **Job Output**, **Job Log**, or **Yarn log**.
trans-unit.target: Click a job in the job list to select it, and then use the **Hive Job Summary** window to open **Job Query**, **Job Output**, **Job Log**, or **Yarn log**.

trans-unit.source: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Visual Studio Tools view Hive jobs][12]
trans-unit.target: ![Hadoop tools: HDInsight Visual Studio Tools view Hive jobs][12]

trans-unit.source: Faster path Hive execution via HiveServer2
trans-unit.target: Faster path Hive execution via HiveServer2

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] This feature only works on HDInsight cluster version 3.2 and newer.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] This feature only works on HDInsight cluster version 3.2 and newer.

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight Tools used to submit Hive jobs via WebHCat (also known as Templeton).
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight Tools used to submit Hive jobs via WebHCat (also known as Templeton).

trans-unit.source: It took a long time to return job details and error information.
trans-unit.target: It took a long time to return job details and error information.

trans-unit.source: In order to solve this performance issue, the HDInsight Tools executes Hive jobs directly in the cluster through HiveServer2, so that it bypasses RDP/SSH.
trans-unit.target: In order to solve this performance issue, the HDInsight Tools executes Hive jobs directly in the cluster through HiveServer2, so that it bypasses RDP/SSH.

trans-unit.source: In addition to better performance, users can also view Hive on Tez graphs, and the Task details.
trans-unit.target: In addition to better performance, users can also view Hive on Tez graphs, and the Task details.

trans-unit.source: For HDInsight cluster version 3.2 or later, you can see a **Execute via HiveServer2** button:
trans-unit.target: For HDInsight cluster version 3.2 or later, you can see a **Execute via HiveServer2** button:

trans-unit.source: ![hdinsight visual studio tools execute via hiveserver2](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.visual.studio.tools.execute.via.hiveserver2.png)
trans-unit.target: ![hdinsight visual studio tools execute via hiveserver2](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.visual.studio.tools.execute.via.hiveserver2.png)

trans-unit.source: And you can see the logs streamed back in realtime and see the job graphs if the Hive query is executed in Tez.
trans-unit.target: And you can see the logs streamed back in realtime and see the job graphs if the Hive query is executed in Tez.

trans-unit.source: ![hdinsight visual studio tools fast path hive execution](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.fast.path.hive.execution.png)
trans-unit.target: ![hdinsight visual studio tools fast path hive execution](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.fast.path.hive.execution.png)

trans-unit.source: **Difference between executing queries via HiveServer2 and Submitting Queries via WebHCat**
trans-unit.target: **Difference between executing queries via HiveServer2 and Submitting Queries via WebHCat**

trans-unit.source: Even though executing queries via HiveServer2 has many performance benefits, it has several limitations.
trans-unit.target: Even though executing queries via HiveServer2 has many performance benefits, it has several limitations.

trans-unit.source: Some of the limitations are not suitable for production usage.
trans-unit.target: Some of the limitations are not suitable for production usage.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the differences:
trans-unit.target: The following table shows the differences:

trans-unit.source: Executing via HiveServer2
trans-unit.target: Executing via HiveServer2

trans-unit.source: Submitting via WebHCat
trans-unit.target: Submitting via WebHCat

trans-unit.source: Execute queries
trans-unit.target: Execute queries

trans-unit.source: Eliminates the overhead in WebHCat (which launches a MapReduce Job named “TempletonControllerJob”).
trans-unit.target: Eliminates the overhead in WebHCat (which launches a MapReduce Job named “TempletonControllerJob”).

trans-unit.source: As long as a query is executed via WebHCat, WebHCat will launch a MapReduce job which introduces additional latency.
trans-unit.target: As long as a query is executed via WebHCat, WebHCat will launch a MapReduce job which introduces additional latency.

trans-unit.source: Stream logs back
trans-unit.target: Stream logs back

trans-unit.source: In near real-time.
trans-unit.target: In near real-time.

trans-unit.source: The job execution logs are available only when the job is finished.
trans-unit.target: The job execution logs are available only when the job is finished.

trans-unit.source: View job history
trans-unit.target: View job history

trans-unit.source: If a query is executed via HiveServer2, it’s job history (job log, job output) is not preserved.
trans-unit.target: If a query is executed via HiveServer2, it’s job history (job log, job output) is not preserved.

trans-unit.source: The application can be viewed in YARN UI with limited information.
trans-unit.target: The application can be viewed in YARN UI with limited information.

trans-unit.source: If a query is executed via WebHCat, it’s job history (job log, job output) is preserved and can be viewed using Visual Studio/HDInsight SDK/PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: If a query is executed via WebHCat, it’s job history (job log, job output) is preserved and can be viewed using Visual Studio/HDInsight SDK/PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Close window
trans-unit.target: Close window

trans-unit.source: Executing via HiveServer2 is a “synchronous” way so you must keep the windows open; if the windows are closed then the query execution will be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Executing via HiveServer2 is a “synchronous” way so you must keep the windows open; if the windows are closed then the query execution will be cancelled.

trans-unit.source: Submitting via WebHCat is a “asynchronous” way so you can submit the query via WebHCat and close Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Submitting via WebHCat is a “asynchronous” way so you can submit the query via WebHCat and close Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: You can come back and see the results at any time.
trans-unit.target: You can come back and see the results at any time.

trans-unit.source: Tez Hive job performance graph
trans-unit.target: Tez Hive job performance graph

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight Visual Studio Tools support showing performance graphs for the Hive jobs ran by the Tez execution engine.
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight Visual Studio Tools support showing performance graphs for the Hive jobs ran by the Tez execution engine.

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling Tez, see [use Hive in HDInsight][hdinsight.hive].
trans-unit.target: For information on enabling Tez, see [use Hive in HDInsight][hdinsight.hive].

trans-unit.source: After you submit a Hive job in Visual Studio, Visual Studio shows you the graph when the job is completed.
trans-unit.target: After you submit a Hive job in Visual Studio, Visual Studio shows you the graph when the job is completed.

trans-unit.source: You might need to click the **Refresh** button to get the latest job status.
trans-unit.target: You might need to click the **Refresh** button to get the latest job status.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] This feature is only available for HDInsight cluster version above 3.2.4.593, and can only work for completed jobs.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] This feature is only available for HDInsight cluster version above 3.2.4.593, and can only work for completed jobs.

trans-unit.source: This works for both Windows and Linux based clusters.
trans-unit.target: This works for both Windows and Linux based clusters.

trans-unit.source: ![hadoop hive tez performance graph](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.hive.tez.performance.graph.png)
trans-unit.target: ![hadoop hive tez performance graph](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.hive.tez.performance.graph.png)

trans-unit.source: To help you understand your Hive query better, the tool add the Hive Operator view in this release.
trans-unit.target: To help you understand your Hive query better, the tool add the Hive Operator view in this release.

trans-unit.source: You just need to double click on the vertices of the job graph and you can see all the operators inside the vertex.
trans-unit.target: You just need to double click on the vertices of the job graph and you can see all the operators inside the vertex.

trans-unit.source: You can also hover on a particular operator to view more details of this operator.
trans-unit.target: You can also hover on a particular operator to view more details of this operator.

trans-unit.source: Task execution view for Hive on Tez jobs
trans-unit.target: Task execution view for Hive on Tez jobs

trans-unit.source: The Task execution view for Hive on Tez jobs can be used to get structured & visualized information for Hive jobs, and get more job details.
trans-unit.target: The Task execution view for Hive on Tez jobs can be used to get structured & visualized information for Hive jobs, and get more job details.

trans-unit.source: When
trans-unit.target: When

trans-unit.source: there are performance issues, you can use the view to get further details.
trans-unit.target: there are performance issues, you can use the view to get further details.

trans-unit.source: For example, how each task operates and the detailed information about each task
trans-unit.target: For example, how each task operates and the detailed information about each task

trans-unit.source: (data read/write, schedule/start/end time, etc.), so that you can tune job configurations or system architecture based on the visualized information.
trans-unit.target: (data read/write, schedule/start/end time, etc.), so that you can tune job configurations or system architecture based on the visualized information.

trans-unit.source: ![hdinsight visual studio tools task execution view](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.visual.studio.tools.task.execution.view.png)
trans-unit.target: ![hdinsight visual studio tools task execution view](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started/hdinsight.visual.studio.tools.task.execution.view.png)

trans-unit.source: Run Pig scripts
trans-unit.target: Run Pig scripts

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio supports creating and submit Pig scripts to HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio supports creating and submit Pig scripts to HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: Users can create a Pig project from template, and then submit the script to HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: Users can create a Pig project from template, and then submit the script to HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: In this article, you learned how to connect to HDInsight clusters from Visual Studio, using the Hadoop tools package, and how to run a Hive query.
trans-unit.target: In this article, you learned how to connect to HDInsight clusters from Visual Studio, using the Hadoop tools package, and how to run a Hive query.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see:
trans-unit.target: For more information, see:

trans-unit.source: [Use Hadoop Hive in HDInsight][hdinsight.hive]
trans-unit.target: [Use Hadoop Hive in HDInsight][hdinsight.hive]

trans-unit.source: [Get started using Hadoop in HDInsight][hdinsight.get.started]
trans-unit.target: [Get started using Hadoop in HDInsight][hdinsight.get.started]

trans-unit.source: [Submit Hadoop jobs in HDInsight][hdinsight.submit.jobs]
trans-unit.target: [Submit Hadoop jobs in HDInsight][hdinsight.submit.jobs]

trans-unit.source: [Analyze Twitter data with Hadoop in HDInsight][hdinsight.analyze.twitter.data]
trans-unit.target: [Analyze Twitter data with Hadoop in HDInsight][hdinsight.analyze.twitter.data]
